mapper.select: select doc.*, dept.dname, emp.ename from doc, dept, emp where doc.dno = dept.dno and doc.eno = emp.eno and doc.eno = #{eno}
select doc.*, dept.dname, emp.ename from doc, dept, emp where doc.dno = dept.dno and doc.eno = emp.eno and docNo = #{docNo}
mapper.insert: insert into doc(docNo, docClass, docDate, dno, eno, docTitle, docContent) values(docNO('now'), #{docClass}, #{docDate}, #{dno}, #{eno}, #{docTitle}, #{docContent})
